pr_title: replace remaining named disjunctions with namedOneOf or namedNoneOf

timeline.bodyText: Extreme nitpick, but is prefices really a word? I always though that it was prefixes, since prefix is not a proper latin word to begin with.
timeline.author: bantonsson

timeline.message: replace remaining named disjunctions with namedOneOf or namedNoneOf
